TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to defeat the Scorpion. You must try again.
You have defeated the Scorpion. You must now return to Red-Axe.
Red-Axe is pleased with your progress.
You must go to the Scorpion's Cave and battle a Giant Scorpion.
You must return to Red-Axe in the city of Tusk.
This Scorpion is larger than the others. It has more Life Points and a higher Air Mastery skill.
